text: Demand ischemia (in the absence of ACS) Supraventricular tachycardia/atrial fibrillation Left ventricular hypertrophy Anemia Hypotension Hypovolemia Direct myocardial damage Cardiac contusion Direct current cardioversion Cardiac infiltrative disorders Chemotherapy Myocarditis Cardiac transplantation (immune-mediated reactions) Myocardial strain Congestive heart failure Pulmonary embolism Pulmonary hypertension or COPD Chronic renal insufficiency Sepsis/systemic inflammatory processes Intracranial pathology Intracerebral hemorrhage or stroke
